page.title: 06POPULATION IN BETTYHILL
page.content: We conducted a census in our block using the voters roll as a basis. There are 218 people in our block, mostly living in the village. Therefore a large part of our area is deserted. There are 120 women and only 98 men. There is a total of 55 pensioners and 35 of them are women. There are 44 children under the age of 16 and again most are female (26). Eleven males are unemployed out of a total of 60 males of working age. This is 18% and is well above the national average. Of the 59 females of working age 29 are employed. Most of these work part time as home helps or in the shops or hotels. The populatin has dropped 50% since the turn of the century. Sadly this decline continues.
